title: Verizon Throttling
body: To anyone who is curious about the ping problems it seems as if Verizon is most likely throttling their networks right now. goodluck playing massive online games {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Hmmmmm I'm not sure this has anything to do with throttling at all. Be sure to check this outage map if you're on Verizon!

http://downdetector.com/status/verizon/map/
